title: What Does the Modern Data Stack Actually Mean?
author: Daniel Avancini
description: Daniel Avancini offers some perspective on what the modern data stack means by outlining the history of data stacks, and the characteristics of a modern data stack.
cntitle: 现代数据堆栈的实际含义是什么？
cndescription: Daniel Avancini 通过概述数据堆栈的历史和现代数据堆栈的特征，提供了一些关于现代数据堆栈的意义的见解。
